content: the next stitch yo draw up a loop leave loop on hook like a tunisian simple stitch but with the hook inserted from the twisted tunisian simple twtss opposite side = insert hook from left to right under front vertical stitch bar of the next stitch yo draw up a loop leave loop on hook insert hook from right to left under back vertical bar of the next trs tunisian reverse stitch stitch yo draw up a loop leave loop on hook 2 tunisian simple stitches insert hook from right to left under front vertical bars of next 2 2tsstog worked together as for 1 stitches yo draw up a loop leave loop on hook stitch yo tss 3 times into same st yo draw through 6 loops leave loop tbs tunisian bobble stitch on hook repeat repeat rem remaining pull the loop of the st just made through the loop of the st made slip_stitch slip_stitch previously insert hook into st/side of row from front to back of work yo double_crochet uk double_crochet draw through a loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook repeat into terminology each st/row across working from right to left like a double_crochet stitch but worked from left to right instead of right to left = insert hook into top of double_crochet st yo draw through a crab stitch loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook repeat into each double_crochet st across working from left to right rs right side retp return pass yo draw through 1 loop *yo draw through 2 loops* repeat across instructions to be repeated * as directed © 2019 hayley joanne robinson tunisian sampler shawl | page 4 tunisian sampler shawl - pattern section 1 simple stripes easy stripes worked in the tunisian simple stitch using 2 colours this section uses yarns a and b pattern row 1 skip first vb tfs in first space to increase tss with yarn a chain 3 to mark st work centre increase tss to end tfs in last space foundation row yo pull up a loop in the back of the to increase work es 21 work retp second chain from hook yo pull up a loop in the back of pattern row 2 same as pattern row 1 25 work retp the third chain from hook 5 st work retp pattern row 3 same as pattern row 1 29 work retp set up row 1 skip first vb tfs in first space to increase tss in change to a at the end of retp next st tfs in next space to increase tks in next st mark st pattern row 4 same as pattern row 1 33 work retp with st marker tfs in next space to increase tss in next st pattern row 5 same as pattern row 1 37 work retp tfs in last space to increase work es 9 work retp pattern row 6 same as pattern row 1 41 work retp set up row 2 skip
